author: Dahl (1968)
notes: Dahl Otto Chr. (1968) Contes Malgaches en Dialecte Sakalava: Textes, Traduction, Grammaire et Lexique
problems: The list is full of gaps + a few misinterpretations.Dahl (1968) only provides a glossary of 17 pages. A more appropriate source is the online \Dictionnaire des dialectes sud-ouest du malgache\" started by V.D. Mahavere  (1925-1926) but vastly expanded by Noël Gueunier. I used it to compensate and check (SA)"
classification: Austronesian, Malayo-Polynesian, Greater Barito, East, Malagasy
